title: Mercury Transit in the 4th House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: When Mercury transits the 4th house for Sagittarius Ascendant, focus turns to home, family matters, and emotional security. Conversations within the household increase, and practical decisions related to property, vehicles, or education come to the forefront. The mind seeks comfort and clarity in personal spaces. However, overthinking domestic issues or blunt communication can disturb peace. When handled calmly, this transit supports smart home planning, clear family dialogue, and balanced emotional understanding.

sections.title: Relationships
points: Mother or elders play a role

closing: This Mercury transit highlights home and emotions. With calm communication, it supports domestic clarity and mental comfort.
